greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of labeled mobiles (circular rooted trees) with n nodes and k leaves.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275 (first 50 rows)
Index entries for sequences related to mobiles
mathematica: T[rows_] := {{1}}~Join~((cc = CoefficientList[#, y]; Append[Rest[cc], 0] * Length[cc]!)& /@ (CoefficientList[InverseSeries[x/(y-Log[1-x + O[x]^rows] ), x], x][[3;;]]));
program: A(n)={my(v=Vec(serlaplace(serreverse(x/(y - log(1-x + O(x^n))))))); vector(#v, i, Vecrev(v[i]/y, i))}
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, May 15 2000
